name: Witches' Hats
author: jazzchick
summary: A cute and simple little Halloween treat that everyone will love. The amount this recipe makes depends on how many cookies and chocolate kisses you have. It just depends on how many you want. The last time I made these, I ended up making about 140 or so.
ingredients: ¼ cup honey, or as needed
1 (9 ounce) bag milk chocolate candy kisses, unwrapped
directions: Place a fudge stripe cookie with bottom side up onto a work surface
Smear a small dab (about 1/8 teaspoon) of honey onto the bottom of a chocolate kiss, and secure the candy piece to the center of the cookie, covering the hole
Use decorating gel to pipe a small bow onto the cookie at the base of the candy piece
